programme.title: James Baker and Clinton's deficit
programme.short_synopsis: Can President Clinton deliver on his campaign promises and how much does healthcare cost?
programme.medium_synopsis: Outgoing cabinet member James Baker, President Clinton's failure to deliver on his campaign promise of a tax cut for the middle class, and the true cost of healthcare.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
